alert.note: Alert for Audubon; Carroll; Cass; Dallas; Greene; Guthrie (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 1:32AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with Heavy Rain May Cause Localized Flooding across portions of southwestern Greene, northwestern Cass, Guthrie, Audubon, southeastern Carroll and northwestern Dallas Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 129 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms producing heavy rain across western into central Iowa. Up to 2 inches of rain has already fallen. As much as 1 to 3 additional inches of rainfall are possible. HAZARD...Additional heavy rainfall of one to three inches. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Ponding of ponding of water on roadways, low visibilities, and rises in small streams and creeks. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 50 and 70. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for central, southwestern and west central Iowa.

area.areaDesc: Audubon; Carroll; Cass; Dallas; Greene; Guthrie
